backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or state.
feature_evidence.json: Metadata describing a feature report referencing updates to frontend/index.html.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of various frontend source files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode overrides, and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting document metadata and mounting the React app with title 'Aswin-Resume'.
frontend/README.md: Project README outlining features, image replacement instructions, and steps to add certificates.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Configures routes with TanStack Router and wraps the app in theme and identity providers.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthContext: Auth context managing main user state and authentication via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/certificates/Cer: Renders a grid of certificate preview cards with PDF/image handling and scroll reveal animations.
Modal displaying certificate details with PDF iframe or image rendering plus metadata.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Global layout with background texture, top navigation, routed content outlet, and footer links.
frontend/src/components/media/ProfilePho: Profile photo component showing uploaded image or fallback with decorative effects.
frontend/src/components/motion/RevealOnS: Wrapper animating children into view using IntersectionObserver and reduced-motion support.
frontend/src/components/navigation/TopNa: Responsive top navigation bar with links, authentication controls, and editing options for the main user.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/modal: Modal for editing About page text fields including titles, bio, and additional info.
Modal for adding or editing certificate details and files with validation, save, and delete support.
Modal listing certificates with preview thumbnails, allowing selection or creation of new certificates.
Modal for editing certificates page title and subtitle with simple form fields.
Modal to edit contact page headings and call-to-action text fields.
Modal for managing experience entries, including adding, editing, and removing jobs and achievements.
Modal to customize homepage hero text such as headline, tagline, and description.
Simple modal to update and save the user's displayed name.
Modal to edit personal details including name, bio, contact info, and location.
A modal for adding, editing, and removing project entries, with local state and save/cancel handlers.
A modal to edit the projects page title and subtitle, syncing state when opened.
A modal for updating the site's navigation title with simple save and cancel behavior.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Onboa: Controls whether users see the welcome screen, onboarding workflow, or main site layout based on onboarding state and main-user status.
Main onboarding interface allowing users to upload profile data, manage certificates, and edit various site content sections through modals.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/Uploa: Context provider storing onboarding data and content, offering update, save, skip, and reopen functions with persistence.
frontend/src/components/onboarding/uploa: Defines onboarding-related data interfaces and provides helpers for loading, saving, clearing, and normalizing onboarding data in localStorage.
A Three.js scene rendering a rotating distorted sphere with optional reduced motion support.
frontend/src/components/three/SecondaryS: A Three.js scene showing animated floating boxes with reduced-motion handling.
frontend/src/components/three/ThreeCanva: A wrapper component that sets up a shared Canvas configuration for Three.js scenes.
frontend/src/components/welcome/WelcomeS: A welcome screen showing user info with options to edit their name or continue onboarding.
frontend/src/data/certificates.ts: Static sample certificate metadata used for display or testing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on identity change.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, handling login, stored identities, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/usePrefersReducedMoti: Returns whether the user prefers reduced motion by listening to a media query.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently empty.
frontend/src/hooks/useSmoothScroll.ts: Toggles smooth scrolling based on the user's reduced‑motion preference.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes along with motion‑reduction rules.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders an about page with profile details, bio sections, skills, and animated reveal components using uploaded or default content.
frontend/src/pages/CertificatesPage.tsx: Displays a certificates gallery using uploaded or static certificates with a modal for viewing details.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Shows contact information, CTA text, and social links sourced from uploads or fallbacks with animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/ExperiencePage.tsx: Presents a timeline of work experience using uploaded or default items with RevealOnScroll animations.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Implements the homepage with a 3D hero scene, dynamic text from uploads context, animated sections, and links to projects and contact. Also includes a features section showcasing services.
frontend/src/pages/ProjectsPage.tsx: Renders a projects listing page with optional custom projects, a 3D scene, animated reveal sections, and project cards with tags and links. Uses uploads context to override titles and project data.
frontend/src/theme/tokens.ts: Defines shared design tokens for motion timings/easing and spacing values for sections and containers.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with extended colors, fonts, shadows, radii, keyframes, and plugins, along with content paths and container settings.
project_state.json: Tracks project metadata, feature requests, and current state, including a request to update the browser tab title to 'Aswin-Resume'.
